metadata.description:
The progress bar widget  show how many humans have been proved with I-AM-HUMAN soul-bound-token out of 1000 humans.
Title content and button are dynamic so you can provide content for it, but you don't have. If you don't provide value for element it will not be rendered. 
Widget is also adjustable for dark or light theme. 
Props example {
  "widgetBarWidth": 300,
  "infoTitle": "I am human Signup progress",
  "infoText": "With SBT you will have a strong proof-of-personhood, which can give you access to vote, apps, DAOs and more.",
  "linkText": "Sign Up Now",
  "linkUrl": "https://i-am-human.app/",
  "theme": "light"
}
metadata.name: Info Progress Widget I AM HUMAN
